net.enilink.komma.dm

Interface IDataManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingDataManager, RDF4JRepositoryDataManager, ThreadLocalDataManager

    public interface IDataManager
extends AutoCloseable
    Interface to an RDF data manager providing a set of methods to query and modify the underlying data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDataManager add(Iterable<? extends IStatement> statements, IReference... contexts)
      Add statements to this data manager
      IDataManager add(Iterable<? extends IStatement> statements, IReference[] readContexts, IReference... addContexts)
      Add statements to this data manager
      IReference blankNode()
      Returns a new data manager specific blank node reference.
      IReference blankNode(String id)
      Returns a data manager specific blank node reference with the given id.
      IDataManager clearNamespaces()
      Removes all namespace declarations from this manager.
      void close()
      Closes this data manager and all open connections.
      <R> IDataManagerQuery<R> createQuery(String query, String baseURI, boolean includeInferred, IReference... contexts)
      Creates an IDataManagerQuery to evaluate the query string.

      Creates an IDataManagerUpdate to evaluate the update string.

      Creates an IDataManagerUpdate to evaluate the update string.

      Return the inferencing capability of the underlying store.

      Gets the namespace that is associated with the specified prefix, if any.

      Returns an iterator of all declared namespaces.

      Returns the resource-level transaction object.

      Returns true if at least one statement exists with the given subject, predicate, and object.

      Returns whether or not there is an open connection to this data source

    • Method Detail

      • add

        IDataManager add(Iterable<? extends IStatement> statements,
                 IReference[] readContexts,
                 IReference... addContexts)
        Add statements to this data manager
        Parameters:
        statements - The statements to add.
        readContexts - The context(s) where to check if data is already existing before adding.
        addContexts - The context(s) where to add the data.
        Throws:
        KommaException - thrown if there is an error while adding the statements

      • add

        IDataManager add(Iterable<? extends IStatement> statements,
                 IReference... contexts)
        Add statements to this data manager
        Parameters:
        statements - The statements to add.
        contexts - The context(s) where to add the data.
        Throws:
        KommaException - thrown if there is an error while adding the statements

      • clearNamespaces

        IDataManager clearNamespaces()
        Removes all namespace declarations from this manager.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this data manager and all open connections. All subsequent operations on a disconnected data source will throw IllegalStateExceptions.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • createQuery

        <R> IDataManagerQuery<R> createQuery(String query,
                                     String baseURI,
                                     boolean includeInferred,
                                     IReference... contexts)
        Creates an IDataManagerQuery to evaluate the query string.
        Parameters:
        query - RDF query in the configured language - default SPARQL.
        baseURI - base URI for relative URIs or null if the query does not contain relative URIs
        includeInferred - Controls if inferred statements should be included to compute the results or not.
        contexts - The context(s) where to read and modify data.
        Returns:
        IDataManagerQuery.

      • createUpdate

        IDataManagerUpdate createUpdate(String update,
                                String baseURI,
                                boolean includeInferred,
                                IReference[] readContexts,
                                IReference... modifyContexts)
        Creates an IDataManagerUpdate to evaluate the update string.
        Parameters:
        update - RDF update in the configured language - default SPARQL.
        baseURI - base URI for relative URIs or null if the update does not contain relative URIs
        includeInferred - Controls if inferred statements should be included to compute the results or not.
        readContexts - The context(s) where to read existing data.
        modifyContexts - The context(s) where to modify the data.
        Returns:
        IDataManagerUpdate.

      • createUpdate

        IDataManagerUpdate createUpdate(String update,
                                String baseURI,
                                boolean includeInferred,
                                IReference... contexts)
        Creates an IDataManagerUpdate to evaluate the update string.
        Parameters:
        update - RDF update in the configured language - default SPARQL.
        baseURI - base URI for relative URIs or null if the update does not contain relative URIs
        includeInferred - Controls if inferred statements should be included to compute the results or not.
        contexts - The context(s) where to get or modify the data.
        Returns:
        IDataManagerUpdate.

      • getInferencing

        InferencingCapability getInferencing()
        Return the inferencing capability of the underlying store.
        Returns:
        InferencingCapability The inferencing capability.

      • getNamespace

        URI getNamespace(String prefix)
        Gets the namespace that is associated with the specified prefix, if any.
        Parameters:
        prefix - A namespace prefix.
        Returns:
        The namespace name that is associated with the specified prefix, or null if there is no such namespace.

      • getNamespaces

        IExtendedIterator<INamespace> getNamespaces()
        Returns an iterator of all declared namespaces. Each Namespace object consists of a prefix and a namespace uri.
        Returns:
        An iterator containing INamespace objects.

      • getTransaction

        ITransaction getTransaction()
        Returns the resource-level transaction object. The ITransaction instance may be used serially to begin and commit multiple transactions.
        Returns:
        IKommaTransaction instance

      • hasMatch

        boolean hasMatch(IReference subject,
                 IReference predicate,
                 IValue object,
                 boolean includeInferred,
                 IReference... contexts)
        Returns true if at least one statement exists with the given subject, predicate, and object. Null parameters represent wildcards.
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject to match, or null for a wildcard
        predicate - the predicate to match, or null for a wildcard
        object - the object to match, or null for a wildcard
        includeInferred - Controls if inferred statements should be included to compute the results or not.
        contexts - The context(s) where to get the data.
        Returns:
        true if at least one matching statement exists, else false.
        Throws:
        KommaException - thrown if there is an error while getting the statements

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Returns whether or not there is an open connection to this data source
        Returns:
        true if there is a connection, false otherwise.

      • match

        IExtendedIterator<IStatement> match(IReference subject,
                                    IReference predicate,
                                    IValue object,
                                    boolean includeInferred,
                                    IReference... contexts)
        Returns all the statements with the given subject, predicate, and object. Null parameters represent wildcards.
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject to match, or null for a wildcard
        predicate - the predicate to match, or null for a wildcard
        object - the object to match, or null for a wildcard
        includeInferred - Controls if inferred statements should be included to compute the results or not.
        contexts - The context(s) where to get the data.
        Returns:
        an IExtendedIterator of matching statements.
        Throws:
        KommaException - thrown if there is an error while getting the statements

      • blankNode

        IReference blankNode()
        Returns a new data manager specific blank node reference.

      • blankNode

        IReference blankNode(String id)
        Returns a data manager specific blank node reference with the given id.

      • remove

        IDataManager remove(Iterable<? extends IStatementPattern> statements,
                    IReference... contexts)
        Remove statements from this data manager
        Parameters:
        statements - The statements to remove.
        contexts - The context(s) where to remove the data.
        Throws:
        KommaException - thrown if there is an error while removing the statements

      • removeNamespace

        IDataManager removeNamespace(String prefix)
        Removes a namespace declaration by removing the association between a prefix and a namespace name.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The namespace prefix of which the assocation with a namespace name is to be removed.

      • setNamespace

        IDataManager setNamespace(String prefix,
                          URI uri)
        Sets the prefix for a namespace.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The new prefix.
        name - The namespace name that the prefix maps to.
